p: Representative concentration pathway 4.5 assumes that the global warming will increase from 0.9 to 2.0 and 1.1 to 2.6 °C between the years 2046 and 2064 and 2081–2100, respectively. Mean global sea level will increase from 0.19 to 0.33 and 0.32 to 0.63 m over the same periods ( Stocker et al., 2013).
